website_summaries.verdict: The HTC Desire 610 offers a modern Android experience for little cash, but you get what you pay for in the form of disappointing display quality.

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Phone
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and is great quality. Seller was excellent also.
customer_reviews.author: CA

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Very curtious and respectful.. They were nice and contacted me about any issues. I'd order from them again. Definitely.. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah Lee

customer_reviews.title: I was happy to find a phone for my son that wasn't ...
customer_reviews.text: I was happy to find a phone for my son that wasn't too expensive and actually worked! I don't bother with a plan, I just want him to have a way to text me when I not with him.
customer_reviews.author: Candida Abbey

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Item received and worked properly saved money on replacing with another brand new phone
customer_reviews.author: Debra D. Henson

customer_reviews.title: The phone came with a password lock on it and ...
customer_reviews.text: The phone came with a password lock on it and the company that it came from refused to answer my calls for days and when u finally got a call back they refused to help.. luckely I had a friend who was able to get into it and remove the lock.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wasted money..Bad product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Phone did not work when it arrived. Sims card would not stay in the phone. Wasted money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: CELLPHONE
customer_reviews.text: Good morning. I bought this product and asked me "pin unlock sim card network." buy the phone is unlocked for any sim. Please, I can provide the unlock code? Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Arelis Barreto

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Keyboard calibration is broken and I have to use voice text
customer_reviews.author: Shalako

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement
customer_reviews.text: Didn't cost much and works great, just like the one I trashed.
customer_reviews.author: Linms

customer_reviews.title: Had to buy another phone
customer_reviews.text: No the ear phones outlet stop working about 2wks ago! The phone kept freezing up. So I had to buy another phone
customer_reviews.author: Asteria Jones

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Took one picture with this phone and then the camera would not work anymore.
customer_reviews.author: DMC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved this phone had to send it back phone would not work good with At&t
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Claybrooks

customer_reviews.title: STRONG
customer_reviews.text: This phone is so durable that it just won't die! It has fallen countless times on tile before it finally got cracks. Even with a cracked screen, it works perfectly unlike samsung and iphones! I'm still waiting for this phone to be terribly damaged before I can upgrade. I've had it for 3 years!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Mohamed

customer_reviews.title: Buy it! Use it!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product at the price. I would like to recommend anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Remy Mcgowan

customer_reviews.title: Buy it! Use it!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product at the price. I would like to recommend anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline	Pope

customer_reviews.title: dont overcrowd
customer_reviews.text: Great phone best phone I have had since the BlackBerry pearl. The key to every cell phone is don't cram it full of unnecessary crap.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

product_meta.title: HTC Desire 610, Black 8GB (AT&T)
product_meta.description: Hard plastic background with flexible silicon sides. Offers reasonable every day protection to your device without adding that much bulk to the thin profile of the iPhone . Protect your iPhone in style! Perfect gift for any fan!
feature_bullets: Slim and form-fitting case with easy grip sides
Plenty of space to easily access all side buttons
Hard Plastic Back with Silicon Edges. This case protects all sides of your Phone
Compatible with Apple Phone nch (NOT PLUS)
